medical_history.history_of_present_illness: Patient reports diffuse periumbilical pain that started 3 days ago, which worsened over the following two days to localize in the right lower quadrant (RLQ). Last night at 7pm, the pain became 'unbearable' and was associated with anorexia and near-continuous nausea and non-bilious vomiting. The pain worsens with movement and deep breathing. Patient also reported constipation. Denies any fever or chills.
medical_history.past_medical_history: History of HIV (CD4 474, VL undetectable), Bell's palsy, condyloma acuminata, depression.
